title: NetBeans Software Day
body: The folks from the NetBeans open source project have put together a companion event being held alongside JavaOne in San Francisco. They've got quite a pile of cool stuff to talk about and show off. I'll be there, giving a talk in the morning to help kick things off. They've packed the day with a wide range of material, including all the new stuff in NetBeans 4 and the tools for developing mobile applications. It's even better than free, it has a negative price... Sign up for NetBeans software day and you can get a $300 discount on a JavaOne pass.
